mapper.select: SELECT C.* FROM CERTIFICATIONS C JOIN USERS U ON U.IDX = C.USER_IDX WHERE LOWER(U.EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email}) AND C.EXPIRES_AT > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND C.USED = 0 ORDER BY C.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT C.* FROM CERTIFICATIONS C JOIN USERS U ON U.IDX = C.USER_IDX WHERE LOWER(U.EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email}) AND C.USED = 1 ORDER BY C.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT 1
